textAfterTable: Description Paige Denim - Verdugo, women's ultra skinny ankle length jeans in a Benny blue wash with a mid rise and faded finish. The five pocket jeans also feature a Paige embossed top button, zip fly, metal rivets, zipped cuffs and a rear Paige Denim leather waistband tab. Model is 5'9" and a 26" jean size. Model wears a 26 Each style has the classic 'The Bottom Bra' design to lift the rear, including specific positioning of the pockets to lift and support the bottom, a smaller yoke at the back of the jean minimises the gape that you can get at the back of the waistband, and adjusted side seams to lengthen the leg and make the hips look slimmer. Rise 8" Inseam 29" Leg opening 5" Paige Denim at Coggles. com 98% Cotton, 2% elastane Product Details Jean Fit: Skinny Fit Denim Wash: Mid Wash Brand: Paige Delivery & Returns How long will it take to arrive?
